### Snow Removal and Sanding Work – Operation Centre – St-Mathieu-du-Parc

#### Tender Information

* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01008942
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** 5P300-22-0119-A
* **Publication Date:** 2022-10-03
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-02T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** 2022-10-05

#### Tender Details

Parks Canada seeks qualified contractors to provide snow removal and sanding services at the Operation Centre in St-Mathieu-du-Parc. The contract involves providing equipment and services to clear snow and ice from multiple locations on site, including parking lots, sidewalks, and access roads.

#### Key Requirements

* Clear snow and ice from a 4,500 m2 parking lot and building
* Clear snow and ice from a 300 m2 path leading to waste containers
* Clear snow and ice from a 55 m access road leading to Door No. 10 at the rear of the Operations Centre
* Clear snow and ice from a 13 m section in front of Door No. 1 facing St-Paul Road
* Clear snow and ice from a 3 m wide corridor in a gravel parking lot
* Clear snow and ice from tops of three tanks and a gas pump, as well as three boxes located at the Complex

#### Contract Period and Delivery Date

* The contract period is from the date of contract to March 31, 2023, inclusive
* The Contractor grants to Canada the irrevocable option to extend the term of the contract by up to four (4) additional one (1) year periods under the same conditions

#### Bid Submission

Bids must be submitted by fax or email to the address listed in the solicitation document. The only acceptable email address for responses to the bid solicitation is soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca. Bids submitted by email directly to the Contracting Authority or to any email address other than soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca will not be accepted. The tender closing date is 2022-11-02T14:00:00.

#### Contact Information

For technical and contractual enquiries, please contact Lorraine Fletcher at lorraine.fletcher@pc.gc.ca or 343-585-4712.
